hero.description: We help those who protect our peace. Bulwark Fund stands for transparency, sincerity, and effective support.

about.lead: Bulwark is a space where a shared past and the friendship of nations become the foundation for a common future.
about.p1: We are building a support network that will allow Belarusians to one day return home and bring with them the experience and values needed to build a new, free country.
about.p2: An investment in our fund is an investment in the stability of all of Europe. A democratic Belarus is key to the security of the entire region.
about.stat_desc_1: We have a network of experts, a chatbot, and direct contact with volunteers.
about.stat_desc_2: Every dictator falls. We are preparing the builders of a new Belarus.
about.quote: "Freedom has no borders, and tyranny is a common threat to the entire region."

history.title: Our History
history.lead: The story of Bulwark began not in an office, but through the meeting of a Ukrainian woman from Kharkiv and a Belarusian volunteer.
history.alisa_text: was born in Kharkiv. Until February 24, 2022, she lived a normal life, but after the invasion began, she went through shelling and evacuation. She returned to Ukraine with a firm decision: this is her home, and she will not trade it for anything.
history.vlad_text: is originally from Minsk. In 2020, he endured repressions and torture at Akrescina for participating in peaceful protests. With the start of the full-scale war, he did not hesitate to fight for the freedom of Ukraine and the future of a free Belarus.
history.vlad_path: Vlad went from being an infantryman in the 'Litvin' battalion to a reconnaissance group commander in the Kalinouski Regiment. Currently, he serves in the reconnaissance battalion of the 'Khartia' brigade.
history.conclusion_1: Today, they are building the Bulwark Fund together, uniting those who believe that freedom is everyone's right. They work for the day when they can say:
history.conclusion_highlight: 'We are going back. We are building a new Belarus!'
